value:
$aAll Heroes released in Ver. $a0.X will be
available as Bonus Heroes.

Counters / Completed Actions:
In Pawns of Loki, effects on allies
that would prevent counterattacks
are deactivated. Foe skill effects
that would cause your allies to
have their actions count as
completed are also deactivated.

Note: Resplendent Attire, Dragonflowers,
Sacred Seals, Ascended Assets, blessings,
and accessories will not carry over.

$aUse $a0 to
gain a Forma as your ally?

・ The Forma unit gained as an ally
will lose any Resplendent Attire,
Dragonflowers, Sacred Seals,
ascended assets, blessings, and
accessories they have.
・ Forma cannot be used as the
source for merges or Inherit Skill.
・ Forma cannot be used to create
Combat Manuals.
Your barracks cannot hold any more.

Get Forma in Binding Worlds:
During and after a Binding Worlds
event, you can use an Otherworld
Bond to gain Heroes from other
players' armies as Forma units.

Otherworld Bond:
Otherworld Bonds are available
for purchase from the Shop from
time to time.

Recruitable Heroes:
You can only recruit Heroes that
were released between Ver. 1.0
and Ver. 4.11.

You cannot recruit Heroes you
dispatch, or the Alfonse, Sharena,
or Anna from another world.

What Carries Over to Forma:
Dragonflower stat bonuses will
be the maximum allowed at the
time you add the Forma to your
Barracks. (If the maximum is +15,
they will have +15.) The Forma
gets bonuses no matter how many
Dragonflowers the Hero received.

What Forma Units Inherit:
・ Skills currently equipped
・ Traits

What Forma Do Not Inherit:
・ Merges
・ Ascended Assets
・ Resplendent Attire
・ Blessings
・ Sacred Seals
・ Accessories

Forma Restrictions:
Forma cannot be used as the
source for merges or Inherit Skill,
nor can they be used to create
Combat Manuals.

Merging Forma:
Two Forma units can be merged,
as long as both the source and
the target are Forma.

Miscellaneous:
・ Recruited Heroes will join your
army as 5★, level 40 units.
・ You cannot receive blessings
or other items linked to specific
Heroes.

A treasure that lets you recruit Heroes from
other worlds as Forma in Otherworld Forma.

$a· Orbs and Otherworld Bonds you
  purchase here will be available for
  use only on $a0 devices.

You can view the Heroes that are available
for you to recruit by tapping Recruit Forma.

Once purchased, you can claim your
Otherworld Bond in your Present List.

To celebrate the arrival of
Book VII, a new castle design
is ready for you to use!

Take a look!

Having checked out the
Luminous Castle design,
do you want to use it?

If you change your mind, tap
Upgrade Castle, then Change
Design, then Luminous Castle.

Sharing Usage Data:
We collect, and share, data about your
use of this game in order to analyze
crash reports and, if applicable,
personalize your experiences
with Nintendo products and
services.

You can control this data collection
and sharing using the buttons below.

Updated settings will go into effect once
the app has been restarted.

You can stop sending usage data at any
time by going to the Sharing Usage Data
menu via Misc., under Support, FAQ, etc.,
and changing the setting to Don't allow.

If you want to stop notifications from
appearing outside the app, you can
change the permissions for this app
within your device's settings.
